Name: Cryboo
Desc: Who knows what troubles plague a young Bangboo?

1.Name: Pull-Tab Bomb
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Throws a bomb at the target, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>.

1.Name: Building Heat
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#FF5521>Fire Attribute</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 60% more Anomaly Buildup.
